website_summaries.verdict: Excellent price point for a bag that will carry all of your gear comfortably, including two bats.
pros: Features several pockets, ensuring you can organize your gear and personal items in whatever manner you want
Includes a fence hook for convenience
Bungee cord pocket allows you to hang gloves or hats on the side of the bag
Ventilated material used throughout the baseball bag
Adjustable backpack style straps ensure you can carry the bag comfortably
cons: Zippers and seams will not hold up under stress very well

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backpack for baseball!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 8 year old who is just starting intermediate (little league) baseball. I'm extremely happy with the purchase! The main compartment is super spacious. We put his batting helmet, baseball glove and batting gloves in there. There's a separate zipper compartment for cleats but we use it for his dad's glove so we have it there for warm ups. So there's plenty of storage and utility use. What sold it for me was the versatility of the exterior options on the bag. The drawstring storage and Velcro is nice because it allows easy access and visibility for your frequently used items while still having them secured to your possessions. Nice that the straps are padded too.
customer_reviews.author: Deal Diva

customer_reviews.title: a nice, even weight distribution organized backpack with fence hook
customer_reviews.text: Previous reviews for children... Gone are my glory days of the ultracompetitive ball, and the zippers on my previous ball bag. Straps askew. Behold, a nice, even weight distribution organized backpack with fence hook. Perfect. Holds my adult sized shoes and a couple of gloves and my two favorite bats. This one (over other brands) won out for me in design (hook, bungee for sweater, compartments) and price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea K.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but huge room for all baseball equipment
customer_reviews.text: It has so much room for shoes, helmet, baseball glove, pants, cup, hat, socks, one sweat shirt, one jacket, batting gloves and two bats. Still left some room for extra. It has a hook and mash pockets inside so you could store smaller items separately (e g snacks, towel). The bag itself is not heavy at all. I was a little worried if the bag would be too big and heavy for my 10 year old son, but I was not at all. I think he would be good for several years with it.
customer_reviews.author: JanRom

customer_reviews.title: Best baseball bag backpack
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my grandson, age 7, for his baseball items. Easy for him to carry, comfortable straps as a backpack. Can hold 2 bats, one on each side. Easy zipper for putting helmet, cleats, gloves, etc. inside. Also netting at top to slip a glove into. Well made. Looks great. I think that this will be used for several years. Easy for him to carry. It also has a built in hook that allow him to hook it onto the fence by the dug out, keeps it up, safe and out of the way. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: I love the separate shoe compartment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my 6 year old. He likes having his own bag. I like that all of his baseball gear, including shoes, can fit in one bag so that I don't have to search for it all before every practice and game. It's definitely a big enough bag for adults and kids alike. It's not too cumbersome for him to carry around either, which is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda C

customer_reviews.title: Great bag that gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I just received the bag a few weeks ago. I play in an adult softball league and this bag works great. Its a comfortable size when wearing yet still large enough to hold everything I need with room to spare. Cleat pocket at the bottom is nice to keep the sand away from the rest of my stuff. I wear a 9.5 cleat and they fit easily. While I really like the bag and would recommend it based on price and function, I have not had the bag long enough to speak on its durability. It seems like it is made well, but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry, good storage capacity sports backpack
customer_reviews.text: Got this bag for my son because he wanted something easier to carry than a duffel bag. He loves it and it works great for everything he carries for baseball. The backpack means he isn't off balance and doesn't have a bunch of gear pulling on one shoulder and banging into his legs as he walks. The locker hook is a bonus feature! The straps are well padded so they don't dig into his shoulders. And the other kids on his team and at school have been asking him about the bag and where he got it. The extra compartment for the shoes is brilliant! His shoes don't dump dirt all over the inside of his bag now.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Hopwood

customer_reviews.title: Great bag at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: As parents of kids of who play sports know, equipment costs can add up! I was happy to see this bag that didnt break the bank. The material seems to be pretty sturdy and the bag well made. It fits my sons baseball helmet, glove, batting gloves, a few balls, and two bats (sides). In addition the cords allow him to attach his cleats to the bag as well. Overall very happy. The only thing I would change is I would rather have the opening flap open downwards vs upwards.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Good so far !
customer_reviews.text: It seems nice . My daughter (10) loves it. Season hasn't started yet so we haven't really put it to the test yet but I assume it will be fine . Customer service seems great as they've messaged me twice already to see if I'm happy with the product. They actually sent the cutest little first email and imposed my name into their email they send everyone but it's a nice touch it's really funny and adorable. I just hadnt left a review yet because we hadn't really put it to the test of lugging it to any games and practices yet. Looks wise she loves it. So there's a happy 10 year old softball lover in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Molly McCracken

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BAG GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: From a picky “product buyer”, I am very surprised the quality of this bag! Good zippers, heavy material, plenty of space, strong material. The space for you shoes / cleats is PLENTY big - I wear a size 13 high top clear and they fits very well. Plenty of room in the main pocket for glasses, 2 gloves, and other random gear. The bungy cord is GREAT for attaching a hat / gloves / whatever. Media pockets holds my iPhone 8+ (larger phone). Can’t say enough. Amazing quality for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty!

customer_reviews.title: compact little bag
customer_reviews.text: it's not the biggest bag we've owned but my daughter wanted a smaller bag for taking on the bus to school for after school hitting since she already has her regular backpack. She has the huge bag for a regular game type thing but for this one she only needed a helmet and a bat. This would be good for light use, I could see it making it through a season but not year round like we do, but again for the purpose we needed it'll be a good little bag.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M

customer_reviews.title: Tight squeeze
customer_reviews.text: Looking at the picture, this bag looks great. But in real life, the bats barely fit. I'm certain that by the end of the season the mesh will be ripped. It's really hard putting bats into the bag, which defeats the purpose. If you want a bag that makes transporting your gear easier, I'd look for another product.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Fits larger baseball helmets very well.
customer_reviews.text: Fits an adult size helmet, baseball mitt, baseball and water bottle in main pocket. The bottom pocket fits a pair of baseball cleats probably up to size men’s 11. Wish there was a third pocket for a water bottle on the outside or the slots for the baseball bats were larger:adjustable to fit either water bottles AND/OR basebball bat.
customer_reviews.author: Huh?

customer_reviews.title: I’m torn.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design. My daughter loves it. I’m a little concerned. The material seems flimsy. It hasn’t ripped as of yet so I might just be worrying for nothing. I have a 25 year old Easton bag (the old style) that has held up well. It’s material is thick. This one,,, it’s thin. Reminds me of the difference between a real camping tent and the play tents with Disney characters you buy kids
customer_reviews.author: cdk

customer_reviews.title: Good bag - great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 14 year old daughter, who plays Junior's fastpitch softball. It has PLENTY of room for shoes, batting helmet, bats, balls, glove, sweatshirt and is very well designed. Love the fence hook - very convenient and well made and she LOVED it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: giant hole in the side mesh where bat goes
customer_reviews.text: Helo. This is a great bag, large to hold helmet, clothes, cleates, everything. However, 5 days after the return expired on amazon, one of her bats ripped a giant hole in the side. I would like to see if the seller is open to discuss a replacement or return. Thanks! Jennifer
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P. Bibbo

customer_reviews.title: Better bag than what we had
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, definitely holds gear better then the old one. We like the shoe pocket, and the velcro strip for the batting gloves is cool too. Only complaint...description states the bat storage could double for a water bottle too-not the case unless a very small water bottle-like a 16.9 oz one from a case you'd buy a the grocery store maybe. But certainly no reusable, or Gatorade sports water bottle is going in this area...so we are still carrying that :(
customer_reviews.author: Betty Lou

customer_reviews.title: Not durable enough
customer_reviews.text: The main problem with this baseball bag is durability. The side mesh sleeves for the bats have failed, and the zipper is starting to pull apart from the bag. My son has only used this bag for the spring season, and it needs to be replaced. Now we did only spend $25 on this, so you get what you pay for. The size has been OK. The lay out of the bag design is totally functional. The durability is questionable, at best
customer_reviews.author: FluffpuppypupTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a little weak in at the top, perhaps a design flaw. With just 2 gloves, 1 fielders mask and two bats the top folds in on itself and the bat handles touch or cross. This puts a real strain (weight pulling down) on the small pocket located at the top of the bag resulting in seam/stitching failure as happened with my bag after a just few weeks of use. On the positive side, J&B Trading who actually sold me the bag were awesome. A quick note about the seam failure and 2 days later a new bag was at my door. Now that is great customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Puffin Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 10U athlete that did not have a bag for her equipment. she is a bit on the petite side and the bag fit her well. Holds most of her gear inside and she keeps the glove in the bungee cord area outside the bag. She has her cleats, helmet, facemask, two practice softballs inside the bag and uses the two outside pockets for her bat and water bottle. She loves pink and was thrilled of the camo pattern as she put it its girly but shows she tough too.
customer_reviews.author: Sanson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little league bag!
customer_reviews.text: This was an upgrade for my 7 year olds old t-ball ball bag that didn’t hold much more than a single bat, glove and helmet. The Athletico bag holds his two favorite bats, helmet, his AND my glove, AND his cleats, as well as a few balls. The Velcro strip for his batting gloves makes them easy to grab, and the camo color is super cool. The bag seams really durable and we expect it to last several seasons.
customer_reviews.author: PDouble

customer_reviews.title: Lasted just about 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8U daughter in February 2019. Six months later after 40 games and about 40 practices the bag has giant tear just below the bottom portion of the main zipper. The tear looks almost identical to a previous picture. Yes, my daughter is a heavy user of the bag. But, the bag was NEVER over filled. She has a separate bag for her catcher's gear and anything that doesn't fit easily into this bag. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space to hold equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for sons T-Ball. Lots of room for cleats and helmet. Extra compartment for dirty laundry. For the money it beats out a lot of other bags that cost $20+ more. Only downfall I see is that it doesn’t have an external spot for holding a water bottle. The only mesh pockets hold bats and are only big enough to do just that. Havnt used the hook and probably won’t. I can see why that’s a cool feature but just not something we personally need at this time.
customer_reviews.author: ChriNoDa

customer_reviews.title: Roomy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my 7 year old daughter and it’s plenty big enough to hold all of her equipment...glove, cleats, batting helmet, fielder’s mask,batting gloves and extra balls. I would definitely recommend this bag but I’d make sure to get the adult size especially if your little one is playing minors or above
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: This a nice, well-made baseball bag- I got for my TBall/Little ...
customer_reviews.text: This a nice, well-made baseball bag- I got for my TBall/Little League grandson. He can’t Wait to load up his gear when baseball season starts. I ordered it hoping it would be the right size for a little 5 year old. The website didn’t offer any measurements - but it will be OK and he can grow into it ~ wish it was more of a “junior” size but he thinks it’s very cool:)
customer_reviews.author: moviegal

customer_reviews.title: Will last beyond the first baseball season!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 7 and has used this bag for 8 weeks. It holds everything he needs for practice except a water bottle. Unless you get a skinny water bottle the size of a bat barrel, it won’t fit. He doesn’t mind that at all though. He likes that he can hang it on the fence during games and keep everything right where it should be. He will be able to use this again next year for sure. It’s not too big or too small.
customer_reviews.author: emf

customer_reviews.title: New review 10/5/18
customer_reviews.text: Editing my original review. Bag ripped out above the hidden pocket zipper after less than a year of normal use. Unable to repair so I had to discard the pack. Changing from five stars to three stars. Original review: Very light and has plenty of room for my glove and other softball essentials. Made of high quality materials and the zippers are good quality as well. Only regret is that I didn't purchase it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Chad M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Baseball Bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag is used for my grandsons baseball games! Holds all his equipment very nicely! If I had to choose one thing I thought could be better it would be the the top side loops that hold the bats. They should be able to open up for easier in and out use of the bats! If they were Velcro open and close, instead of elastic fully attached bands, they could be accessed a little better. Otherwise it’s a great bag!
customer_reviews.author: C Bajema

customer_reviews.title: Room for EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my teenage daughter. She needed a new softball bag. She is very happy with it. It holds her helmet, face mask, glove, balls, cleats and 2 bats. Plus has space for her phone, sunflower seeds and a drink. She has stated that her gear feels lighter then before. She had a different backpack prior to purchasing this one. She feels it is very sturdy and appears to be very durable. We can update after the end of the season.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: This bat bag is perfect for my 8 year old daughter for softball
customer_reviews.text: This bat bag is perfect for my 8 year old daughter for softball. She is a little over 4' approx 50lbs. Holds her helmet, glove, bat and water bottle and other items with ease - definitely recommend - also purchased same bag for my 5 year old son for Tee ball and he handles it no problem. approx 40" and 40 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: This held up well through my daughter's first softball season. I wanted a bag that could fit her face mask, helmet with face mask, bat, glove, etc. This bag holds all of her gear with some room to spare. We only used it one season so far but it has held up. I like the hook to hang it on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: AKorf

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking bag with good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. It looks nice and arrived quickly. He said he likes it, but he has to put everything in one pocket. He prefers to have a bigger bag. I personally think it’s a decent size, but I can’t imagine fitting cleats inside the bag with the helmet in there. Customer service is good with follow up emails to ensure your satisfaction and a helpful hint on where to find the hidden hook.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ricks

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bag with lots of extra room.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bag for my 12 year old son while he was playing summer baseball. It had room to hold everything he needed including batting helmet, shoes, hat, batting gloves, 2 baseball mitts, 2 bats, snacks, inhaler, and other items. It hung nicely on the fence so it did not get dirty on the dugout floors and was always easy to reach. My son is very rough on these types of items and this bag held up great. We will use it next season for summer ball.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: Great Back for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my step son. He is 8 years old and will be 8U baseball this season. My thoughts were this seemed like a quality bag for the price, had a lot of pockets for a glove, batting gloves, 2 bats, a water bottle, helmet, hat and shoes. As for my 8 year old, he said it was cool and really liked it. So it has been 8 year old approved! The season hasnt started yet so I can't say what it would be like after the season but for now, we both like it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheeze90

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: My son is on his Varsity High School team and needed a extra bag to hold all his items.. this bag really is not that special. The materials are not heavy duty, the bag in general is very small. His helmet does not fit in the front.. but it fits his bat fine! Over all.. it was a quick purchase and does the job, so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonmama

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bag - Holds EVERYTHING!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bat bag for my daughter to take to softball when I came across this bag. Its perfect. Way better than just a bat bag. It holds her helmet, cleats, batting gloves, glove, ball, 2 bats and water bottle. There is even a place for phone and keys! Its wonderful. Its very roomy. She could even put a change of clothes in it as well. It has a handy fence hook to hang it up with the rest of the bags. It has ventilation holes for the sweatiness of after a game lol. Its perfect. She is very happy with it. A nice book bag style. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Megan B

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Bag from Athletico
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a bigger and better softball bad and this was it. Quality is very good, and we chose this brand based on our older daughter's experience with a different model. Thankfully there were plenty of colors to choose from, and she found one she liked (different from that of her sisters, which makes life easier for all). The bag arrived a few days before the estimated date, which was much appreciated, b/c the plea for a new bag was made only a few days before the season began.
customer_reviews.author: TrapperHj

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and all pockets and zippers make sense!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my son's first year of tball and so happy that I did. He (easily) accesses the pockets and zippers himself with no trouble at all, switching from batting helmet to field cap and glove. Pockets make sense and are very useful and placed well on the bag, such as for: water bottle, cap, helmet, shoes. etc. Hook for fence hanging capability is also a huge plus!
customer_reviews.author: Sweetjan

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for Money
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bag for our son this baseball season. He really likes it; he appreciates all the extra storage compartments available to him. Our son uses this bag two to three times a week with practices and games. The bag appears to be holding up quite well. He is a teenager and can be rough on his things, I think this bag accommodates well.
customer_reviews.author: T. T. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Big!
customer_reviews.text: Material is not as thick as the Easton material, but the design of it seems better. There’s multiple compartments vs the one Easton main compartment. The straps are thick and the hook seems sturdy. Will have to test it’s durability when the season rolls around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size Matters!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect given the inexpensive price, but I was pleasantly surprised when I started exploring this bag. Plenty of room in the main compartment for a couple of gloves and a lower show compartment big enough for cleats/turfs. This bag is suitable for the rec league player, but the quality of the zippers and stitching seem "meh" and could break from heavy use. Remember, you get what you pay for... I am certainly happy with my purchase though since the bag is perfect for my situation.
customer_reviews.author: BnB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Baseball Bag for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my 8 year old grandson. He used it all season for Little League. There is room for everything and everything has its place. It helps keep him organized. His first bag wore out after 2 seasons, so, I got him another one. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Faust

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag, lots of utility and well made
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, great benefits of buying a bag specifically made for a sport - holds bats, cleats and other essentials where they are taking care to keep dirty cleats separate from clothes and mit. Enough pockets to organize but not to always be looking for something in another pocket. Researched a lot - looked at more expensive bags and bigger brand names - but this one is holding up much better than teammates bags. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Native To Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her softball games and practice. It has held up nicely. We can fit her bat, cleats, and gloves in separate section and not have to worry about things getting messed up. It is easy for her to carry and has a hook so she can hang it on the fence while they are playing.
customer_reviews.author: Na'Tasna

customer_reviews.title: Fits all softball gear and more!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my 12 year old daughter who needed more room for her softball gear. She was able to fit her helmet, mask and glove in the main part of the bag and 2 bats on the outside. The bag seems like it’s good quality. She plays several sports and seems to need a bag for each one. I didn’t want to spend a lot on another bag. I’m very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Workingmama

customer_reviews.title: Fatal flaw design with this bat backpack
customer_reviews.text: Bat holders on each side ripped after only 2 weeks of use. This bag is excellent except the bottom of the bat holders are pure mesh and should be changed to hard nylon. In addition. The nylon should be wider at the bottom to accommodate bigger barrel bats. So this product is fatally flawed and do not recommend. Your children will be disappointed and upset after a few days of use when their bats can no longer be kept on the side of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: FairfaxCityDad

customer_reviews.title: Fits all of our equipment-as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my child for all of her softball games. She loves the color and it fit all of her equipment nicely. Customer service is great and many of her teammates have purchased this as well. Have not had it very long so I can't speak about durability. It looks to be well made and comes in a variety of colors. So far we are very happy with the purchase. We will probably be buying more items in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.  Ripped right along the zipper after a month of use.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Ripped right along the zipper after using it for a month. Spend a little extra and get a bag that will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: CourtMcSol

customer_reviews.title: It just doesn't seem like it will hold up for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy, holds everything my 7 year old needs such as gloves, balls, bat, batting helmet, shoes and water bottle. It just doesn't seem like it will hold up for a long time. The fabric feels a little flimsy and I worry the mesh that holds the bat will rip. Time will tell. If it proves to be sturdy after all I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Wildflower

customer_reviews.title: Hold all the stuff they need in the dugout
customer_reviews.text: End of the fall ball season and yhe bag looks good and holds all the gear plus extra space for snacks/ drink bottle . Trim stands out and it’s looks as good as new despite being tossed from car to floor to dugout to field and game and back again twice a week for a whole season
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Ashton

customer_reviews.title: 100% Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for my 10 yr old in baseball. We tried the duffel bags and it tore from being so heavy. We used this bag for a whole season and a half so far and it is still as sturdy as the first day we received it. It has lots of room in the main part for his cleats, gloves, and helmet. Keeps things very well organized and evenly distributed to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Nik

customer_reviews.title: Classy baseball bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag because it appears to have everything my grandson would need in providing all the things he takes to his base ball games. It’s a gift for his birthday so he still hasn’t received it yet. I’m sure he will like it though. I like the red trim color as well. Looks like it is sturdy and made well.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy w

customer_reviews.title: lasted one season only
customer_reviews.text: We loved the look and size of this bag. However, it only lasted one season of softball, and now has a giant rip in the center of bag's stitching over the zipper. Other than the hole, it looks brand new, as it had very little use, but it couldn't hold a helmet and glove without ripping. At the start of the season, I had recommended this bag to other teammates, but now I wouldn't. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Baseball Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for older kids, unfortunately my daughter is 6 and this bag is just too big for her. There’s so much space for all your baseball gear, and I love that there’s a separate space for cleats- keeps that clay contained to one area. I’ll keep them in mind for when she’s older though!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Melissa T

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Holds all the gear my daughter needed for the season she isn't going to have this year. Easily holds her cleats, helmet, 4 softballs, uniform, her glove and mine with a little room to spare. Bat is held rather securely on the side of it. Does the job it was bought for.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Standard baseball bag.
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing my son had a standard book bag and it was a hassle taking it to his baseball games because everything was fitting so tight. Then we purchased this big and wow we were impressed. In this bag we fit: helmet, baseballs with gloves, water bottle, shoes (cleats) and the baseball bat. AND we still have space. We love it. And the hook it has to place the bag on the gate. Perfect bag so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kervin Perez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Fits all equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Great size. I was looking for a bag for my 12 year old nephew and 9/10 year old nieces and it will work great! It doesn’t come in a box so I needed to save the amazon box to wrap it easier for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good value for kids
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has a lot of pockets and plenty of room for my son to keep all of his equipment in one place. We're pleased with it, especially for youth when you may not want to invest a lot of money as kids may not stick with sports into their adolescence.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pack!
customer_reviews.text: Has all the features needed for a little leaguer. The pack easily fits a helmet, glove, extra balls, water bottle, and bat. A great feature is the fence hook since the kids now have to keep their social distance and only use their own equipment. The pack seems durable and the camo pattern is really cool.
customer_reviews.author: JMT

customer_reviews.title: ZIPPER BROKE ON FIRST USE  *updated review*
customer_reviews.text: My daughter went to zipper up her bag and the zipper broke. Hopfully the new one they are sending will be better. Ill update my review once that happens. *UPDATED* 5.29.19 I received my replacement bag, customer service was great BUT the new bag lasted one month, all the zippered parts are broke, the areas where the bats are held are ripped so my daughter cant use it. Needless to say the qualoty of this bag is awful and unless you only want to use it for a few weeks I do not recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: but isn't too bulky to carry easily. It would not be large enough for catcher's ...
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised by this bag. It is roomy enough for all the baseball gear we've thrown at it so far, but isn't too bulky to carry easily. It would not be large enough for catcher's gear, but otherwise is plenty big. We have a batting helmet, 2 mitts, a pair of youth cleats, and 2 uniforms in there and it still closes easily. I don't often review my purchases, but this seems to be a really good product that is flying somewhat under the radar. It is definitely worth a look, unless you need catcher's gear.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses for softball practice and games and so far she seems to like it. Honestly the best part for me are the funny emails we received from the company after the purchase was made. Interesting take on customer service but time will tell how it handles after the season
customer_reviews.author: Ron Refugio

customer_reviews.title: Side Sleeves are Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I got one for my daughter and all was well. But then I got another one for my son and the side sleeves are too small to fit a bottle of water. Can't squeeze in anything bigger around than a baseball bat. Defeats the purpose and a real PITA to have to carry a water bottle separately. Inconsistent manufacturing. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: tjm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect. Just the right size for my 8 year old to carry comfortably on his back. Yet it is spacious enough to carry his equipment now and for years to come. It easily fits mitt, helmet, hat, gloves and cleats inside. With pockets for a bat and water bottle on the outside. You would still have room for the water bottle on the inside if you have two bats. Well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Zipin

customer_reviews.title: Functional and durable
customer_reviews.text: My son goes through bat bags just about every season. Loved that this one holds two bats easily and securely. Has traveled on tournaments and checked it on airplanes without issue. Large, durable, and bold colors to match his team.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gaskins

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a new bat bag for C ball and he is very happy with this one. Everything seems sturdy and keeps his gear organized well. Looks just like the pictures and arrived packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Penland

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag Great Price
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of bags like this by several other sellers and brands for a lot more money and although I am not familiar with the Athletico brand I decided to give them a try. I am pleased with the overall quality, functionality, and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Dave F.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BASEBALL BAG. MUST HAVE FOR SEASONS
customer_reviews.text: So far the bag is awesome! Durable, easy to use and sturdy. Materials are made of high quality fabrics and zippers. The hook is super heavy duty and isnt flimsy or cheap plastic. My son loves it! So if your wondering if this is a perfect baseball bag for youth well it is, time will tell for how long it lasts but so far impressed
customer_reviews.author: Person Of Interest

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and fit! It fit his bat, helmet, hat ball, multiple mitts, and water bottle with no trouble! And he loved that his bag was custom/unique looking so that he doesn't struggle to find it in the dugout. Seems like it will hold up quite well so far!! USPS tracking always confuses me, but the product was delivered within 2-3 days of purchase as promised! So we are very happy campers!!
customer_reviews.author: Jes Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag baseball and softball
customer_reviews.text: Is a great bag and used regularly. The only problem my daughter encountered, was the stitching came undone on the bottom zipper. Definitely not a deal breaker for the price.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoJournal

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: This bag was a good 15-25 cheaper than most other similar bags with trendier names. The bag is a great size. Holds everything. Water bottle, bat, shoes, hat, helmet etc. Its a bit big and heavy for my 6 year old but thats just his size - this bag is a great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amy Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it for softball! Her favorite color is blue and that’s hard to find for a girl, but it is sturdy and will get used very much and I believe it will hold up very well
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for the perfect price!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a great purchase! Wanted a bag for my son that plays 8U baseball and wanted a bag that could hold absolutely everything he might need. I chose this bag because I just couldn't bring myself to spend a lot of money like what some of the name brand bags cost. This bag showed up and exceeded my expectations! It holds a hat, helmet, two gloves, shoes, two bats, drink, etc. It's perfect! I highly recommend this bag to any baseball Mom or Dad out there!
customer_reviews.author: Braeley Durham

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Product was accurately represented. Well constructed and durable. Really like that it has a place for everything. The bungy cords on the back come in handy for many things. Bought it for 11 year old Grandson, who plays on a traveling baseball team. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: GD

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag looks great and has a nice design. However, the quality is incredibly poor. My 13 year old used this during the spring season of 2019. It only lasted about one month before it started to literally fall apart. It is coming apart quite badly in multiple areas. She will be playing offseason ball this fall. We are now searching for a new, quality bag. Would not buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: jtolb

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, but small side pockets
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice enough bag, but I was surprised by how small the side pockets are. My son's bat does not fit well at all. Also, neither is wide enough to carry a water bottle. I like the bag otherwise. The rest of his equipment fits well, but we are looking for something else that holds a bat and a water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: CEH

customer_reviews.title: Good bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Many pockets and space for all my son’s equipment. The zipper is a little too easy to unzip.. meaning even after it’s closed, a little pressure can make it open.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with my 8 year old! It holds all his baseball goods (water bottle, glove, extra clothes, gloves, bat) and hangs on the fence with a hook attached!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for softball
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Highly recommend! We got this for our daughter to use during the softball season. We really love the separate compartments to keep her cleats away from her glove. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Very large
customer_reviews.text: I would not at all call this bag a bag for a child. This is the size of a large school bag. My son will not be able to carry this bag himself for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Justin & Katie

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift. My grandson LOVES it. It is exactly what he wanted. It has every feature he wanted. A couple of weeks ago, he got a second bat and they both fit in. He's a very happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Got this bag for my son who just started little league. It’s so easy to keep all his gear together and not too heavy for him to carry himself. Love the bat nets in the side and the cleat pocket on bottom. Makes it easy to keep extra dirt and grass out of his bag.
customer_reviews.author: krock

customer_reviews.title: Happy so far!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son so that all his gear was in one place. It seems sturdy and he loves that it is a backpack. I had thought that his helmet would fit on the outside (in the bungees). It doesn’t work there. Still, it fits inside. Now his helmet and hat don’t get thrown on the ground. He has only had this for a week, but he is happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it and can carry it when full.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is exactly what we were looking for. My daughter loves it. It has room for her cleats, helmet, glove, ball, bat, batting gloves, water bottle, and my keys and cell phone. And it’s easy for her to carry. Even with it full. I would definitely get this bag again. Very happy with it. And she’s 6.
customer_reviews.author: brookelynn

customer_reviews.title: Bag was exactly what my sons wanted
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for our Special Olympics son. He and his brother, who received the same bag in a different color, loved the bag and cannot wait for softball season to begin.
customer_reviews.author: sandra vandendriessche

customer_reviews.title: You don't have to look any further! Best Bat Bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bag for the price! I bought this for my 6 year old and it could easily move up with her! The big opening is big enough for her helmet and glove and we have an extra glove on the outside pocket! Seriously this is a great bag for baseball or softball. I could even see myself using it as an adult if I played!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Softball equip
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for HS softball. It looks good and it fits all her gear...helmet, 2 bats, cleats, etc and it is cheaper than in most sporting stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems very well made
customer_reviews.text: It's too early to say how this bag will hold up, but it seems to be very sturdy. It is plenty big to hold everything my son needs. It definitely compares well to the more expensive options from the well known brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag based on reviews. I have been looking for something that can hold my daughters softball equipment - helmet, cleats, glove etc. It’s a birthday gift so I’m hoping it works well for us come softball season. It looks like it can hold a lot along with great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Eva B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It easily holds my Daughter's t ball helmet, glove, bat, hat, and room for more! I love the clip as well to hang for easily removing what she needs in the dugout.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Williams

customer_reviews.title: My son likes it
customer_reviews.text: My son used it this year and liked the layout of the bag. It was easy to find what he was looking for and held up being tossed around in the dugout and in the car. He should be able to use it for a few seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is just perfect. I purchased this for my 13 year old grandson. It is big enough to hold his helmet, gloves, baseballs, 2 bats and has room for a jacket, snacks or whatever else he may need. He is a size 11 shoe and they fit side by side in their own compartment at the bottom of the pack. We have not had it long but it feels strong and durable. You can't beat the price. I would recommend this baseball bat bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ren G.

customer_reviews.title: The bag is sturdy and with enough room for all of my 9 ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag is sturdy and with enough room for all of my 9 year Olds softball gear including spikes and my glove with ball. I only rated it 4 stars initially to see how it holds up for the upcoming season. Will update review later.
customer_reviews.author: VT

customer_reviews.title: little guy loves it
customer_reviews.text: Slightly too big for our 7 year old, which is great because there is room to grow. Seems to be very good quality material and stitching. Love the built in fence hook.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product with 2 different teams and constant games this season, it holds two gloves, a helmet , two pairs of cleats extra balls , a face mask, my belts , two bats and my batting gloves plus my chicken wing . I love this bag ! Definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for Softball. Nice Quality. Lots of room inside.
customer_reviews.text: Great Softball bag. Lots of space for all my daughters softball accessories. My daughter loves it and the price was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this bag. My daughter uses for softball and was so excited to receive it. She is able to fit her catchers gear in here. It has been sturdy for her to carry and comfortable straps. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Ac

customer_reviews.title: Backpack bat bag made my 9-year old VERY happy!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a birthday gift for my grandson. He has filled his bag with all his baseball equipment and loves it! There is plenty of room and the bag is comfortable to where. I am sure that my boy will fit a little more then baseball equipment into the bag causing it to weigh a lot and thank goodness for the side straps that will help distribute the weight. Both my grandson and I are very happy customers!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Ann Danielson

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Excited to have a bag with easy access to his helmet and glove while in the dugout. It fits all his stuff very easily. Seems well built and sturdy. The hook for hanging is very nice and trustworthy. Love that there were so many color options as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack for Softball Equipment!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was SO excited to have this bag with plenty of space for her helmet, glove, and other items as well as a separate space for her cleats. She's only used it once, but is completely thrilled by the compartments and ability to hang the bag on the fence. Overall, we are very, very pleased with this purchase and the price!
customer_reviews.author: mittensmittens

product_meta.title: Athletico Baseball Bat Bag - Backpack for Baseball, T-Ball & Softball Equipment & Gear for Youth and Adults | Holds Bat, Helmet, Glove, Shoes |Shoe Compartment & Fence Hook
feature_bullets: STAY GAME READY WITH ALL YOUR GEAR IN ONE PLACE. PERFECT FOR EVERYONE FROM YOUTH TO ADULT – Designed with room for all your baseball gear, our baseball bags store two bats, a baseball helmet, batting gloves, cleats, baseball cap, and catching glove. Don't settle for a bag that can't even fit your baseball helmet

BREATHABLE COMFORT TO MAKE CARRYING EASY AND VENTILATION TO KEEP THE STINK OUT – Each adjustable sports backpack boasts padded shoulder straps and lumbar protection, as well as a built-in ventilation for cooling comfort
IMPROVED STORAGE – Along with a large main storage compartment, the Athletico baseball and bat bag has extra pockets to hold keys, smartphones, wallets and more.
CONVENIENT ACCESSIBILITY – Bags also feature an integrated fence hook for the dugout, front bungee cord to quickly store hats or gloves, and a vented shoe compartment

RUGGED DURABILITY THAT WILL LAST FOR YEARS – Crafted with high-density 600 Denier Oxford fabric and polyester, our baseball bat bag withstands practice, tournaments and night games. 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED OR YOUR MONEY BACK

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
